Definition at line 146 of file ad_manager_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        list( $Campaigns , $Banners ) = $this->get_campaigns_and_banners();

                        foreach( $Campaigns as $i => $Campaign )
                        {
                              $CompanyTemplate = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'company.tpl' );
                              $CompanyTemplate = $this->String->print_record( $CompanyTemplate , $Campaign );
                              
                              foreach( $Banners as $j => $Banner )
                              {
                                    if( $Campaign->id == $Banner->campaign_id )
                                    {
                                          $BannerTemplate = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'banner.tpl' );
                                          $BannerTemplate = $this->String->print_record( $BannerTemplate , $Banner );
                                          $CompanyTemplate = str_replace( 
                                                '{banners}' , $BannerTemplate.'{banners}' , $CompanyTemplate
                                          );
                                    }
                              }
                              
                              $this->Output .= $CompanyTemplate;
                        }
                        $this->Output = '<div id="ad_companies_list">'.$this->Output.'</div>';
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

get_campaigns_and_banners (  ) 

Function campaigns and banners.

array( $Campaigns , $Banners ).
Exceptions:

Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 100 of file ad_manager_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $UserAlgorithms = get_package( 'user::user_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        $AdCampaignAccess = get_package( 'ad::ad_campaign_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        $AdBannerAccess = get_package( 'ad::ad_banner_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        
                        $Campaigns = $AdCampaignAccess->unsafe_select( 
                              'archived = 0 AND creator = '.$UserAlgorithms->get_id()
                        );
                        
                        $Banners = $AdBannerAccess->unsafe_select( 
                              'archived = 0 AND campaign_id IN ( '.implode_ex( ',' , $Campaigns , 'id' ).' )'
                        );
                        
                        return( array( $Campaigns , $Banners ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
